Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Maplewood
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, 39th, Archer and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Maplewood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, 39th, Archer and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Maplewood. 

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays due to an unauthorized person near the tracks at Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays due to an unauthorized person near the tracks at Pulaski.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide additional connecting service through the affected area from 35th Archer to Midway.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #62 Archer, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
